display_long_description:
ADVANCED PHYSICS:
Our aim was to provide the most realistic TT experience. We spent countless hours on developing our own physics from scratch along with professional TT players.

MULTIPLAYER:
Multiplayer mode allows you to challenge the players from every corner of the world and defeat them with your smart strategy and unbeatable technique.

3DOF CONTROLLER:
We spent a lot of time, to use the Controller to its full potential. We are proud that we have found a solution to give the users the full control over the shots, just like in real life.

CHALLENGING AI:
Thanks to a particularly advanced AI , every opponent you’re going to play will have their own unique style of play.

MOCAP ANIMATIONS:
We relied upon motion capture for our animations. The actors were professional TT players.
Latest update:
Multiplayer!
Improved Gameplay Mechanics
2 new beautiful sceneries with day/night mode
many more...

Please rate the game and give me feedback at sboczek@PixelEdgeGames.com :)
